pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Dimensional Changepoint Detection // Efficient implementations of the following multiple changepoint detection algorithms: Efficient Sparsity Adaptive Change-point estimator by Moen, Glad and Tveten (2023) arXiv:2306.04702 , Informative Sparse Projection for Estimating Changepoints by Wang and Samworth (2017) doi:10.1111/rssb.12243, and the method of Pilliat et al (2023) doi:10.1214/23-EJS2126.
